text: different sets of skills are very important uh skills in livestock production or animal husbend is very important and uh facilitation skill is important Knowledge Management is important and teamwork or team building uh skill is very important and uh planning is also very important and documenting lessons is also very important so somebody who wanted to work in this Innovation systems perspective needs to have both technical skills in his field of specialization and horizontally he has to have some uh additional skills social skills and you learn those from ILY or do you have them before you come to ILY uh definitely I learned from uh by engaging myself in this kind of project otherwise previously I was in the University I was a lecturer and all I posed about was just to have better knowledge and Technical knowhow on in my field of specialization as agricultur Economist now I have to deal with number of issues which was not uh formally given in schools or in any University
